game.name: Cybercube
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cybercube is a fun platformer with many colorful levels. The goal of the game is avoiding obstacles with various mechanics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cybercube is a fun platformer with many colorful levels. The goal of the game is avoiding obstacles with various mechanics.

reviewHighlights.text: Damn, this is a parody of Geometry Dash and it turned out pretty well. But considering its price, all the drawbacks are negligible.
Cybercube is a minimalist platformer built entirely around precision, speed, and the satisfaction of overcoming tightly designed obstacle courses. It...
